<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Focusing Hum](/Spells.aspx?ID=1154)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 105</row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot emanation centered on you

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You infuse the air around you with a sustained hum that allows creatures within it to resist distractions. The DC of any flat check to Cast a Spell while [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for creatures within the area is 2 lower. [Confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) creatures in the area don't attack anyone, including themselves, and instead lose the ability to speak coherently. You take a –2 penalty to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63).
name: Focusing Hum
